events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
The reported issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket. I'm here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund promptly?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is too small and doesn't fit comfortably, so I wonâ€™t be able to keep it.
We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back by tomorrow.
The refund request has been registered and the return label has been sent. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed.
We are following up to confirm we received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method.
Since the refund has been completed successfully, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience!
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on your refund experience.
